name: The Lion and the Rose
writer: George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), George R.R. Martin (written for television by)
actors: Peter Dinklage, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Lena Headey, Charles Dance
plot: Joffrey and Margaery's wedding has come. Tyrion breaks up with Shae. Ramsay tries to prove his worth to his father. Bran and company find a Weirwood tree.
